messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Physics - was Introduction/PAM
messages.msgSnippet: Same author - slightly different title. The one I have here is Thinking Physics is Gedanken Physics. Hmmm - that s on the title page. On the cover it says,
messages.messageBody:
Same author - slightly different title. The one I have here is
"Thinking Physics is Gedanken Physics."
Hmmm - that's on the title page. On the cover it says, "Thinking
Physics: Practical Lessons in Critical Thinking."

-pam
